head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths REYNOLDS, MATTHEW J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths REYNOLDS, MATTHEW J.

block.p: REYNOLDS-Matthew J. Formerly of East Williston, NY, on September 1, 2000. Beloved son of Leah and the late William F. Reynolds, and brother of Sara Danzi, Daniel Weiss, Robert Tyrer and William, Brian, Michael and Robert Reynolds. Dear friend of Glenn Duffy, Chris Gomes and Colin Reilly. Friends may visit Monday, 2-5 and 7-9 PM, at Weigand Bros. Funeral Home, 49 Hillside Ave, Williston Park. Funeral service Tuesday, 1 PM. Interment following at Holy Rood Cemetery, Westbury, NY. In lieu of flowers, a contribution in Matthew's memory to the Gould Farm, Monterey, MA 01245, would be appreciated.
